data.description:
Monkey Mischief is a multiplayer locomotion based VR game for Meta Quest. You  can mess around with your friends or just be monkeys and climb the architecture! However, you can customize and make your monkey unique using cosmetics in our shop, and even purchase Nanas to be dripped out to the max! There are game-modes to also play with your friends to test your skills against each other! Have fun!

This product is not affiliated with Gorilla Tag or Another Axiom LLC and is not endorsed or otherwise sponsored by Another Axiom LLC. Â©2021 Another Axiom LLC.

changelog.change_log:
Bob Rework (screaming added back, faster, etc)
New Interactive Cosmetic! (MonkeBuddy)
Removed Day 1 bundle
Loop button added to Speaker
Voice Chat quality tweaks
Dead bodies in horror now stay for 10 seconds
Noise and blood splatter now added to dead bodies
Pitch black walls in horror fixed
Flashlight in horror dimmed
A small monkey has been added to the Gamemode Selector to tell you if you can change it or not
Added localization to the Code Of Conduct board and loop button on speaker

Voice Chat is now 100% fixed, there is no lag or delay. Proximity chat has also been added.
 Bob (Level 1 horror monster) will now discard his target if they are in spawn (The only area he cannot reach)
Bob's screaming sounds have been removed (Tell us in #feedback if you don't like this change)
Material and color changes in the Mischievious Mall
Adjustments to in-game text
All achievements implemented
Bug that didn't let you skip music is fixed
Changes to Credits board
Music range in Rising Lava increased by 2.5x

Netcode improvements
Voice Chat improvements
More achievements implemented (Not all of them yet)
Authentication server improvements
Bob (horror monster) is now scarier, faster and will not hesitate to kill his target.
Changes to Mall
Lava in Rising Lava is now 2.5x faster
Map barriers fixed
People that aren't you can no longer skip or mute YOUR music

- Rising Lava code changed to be more efficient
- New empty hangers in shop for more cosmetics
- Day One cosmetics off-sale, and removed in the next update
- Some lighting bugs fixed
- Bob (Horror monster) bugs hopefully should be fixed

Voice Chat is back!

- Lava will no longer appear out of its gamemode/Water will reenable out of the Rising Lava gamemode
- Cosmetic visibility fixed (You can now see other people's cosmetics)
- TOS agree button fixed
- Map barrier fixed
- All monkeys in shop/around the map mirror your color

Servers restored
Peformance issues should be fixed
"SHARE" glitch patched, where other people could interact with your game and buy things for you
Locker/Wardrobe added to Shop
IAP fixed

- BRAND NEW MAP FEATURING FOREST AND CAVES!
- WARDROBE/LOCKER SYSTEM (NEW!)
- BETTER MULTIPLAYER
- ACHIEVEMENTS (NEW!)
- RETURNING GAMEMODES SUCH AS HORROR, RISING LAVA AND CAR MONKE!
- FAN ART PAINTINGS (NEW!)
- MOST NANAS LEADERBOARD (NEW!)
- CLIMBING
- REVAMPED SWIMMING
- BRAND NEW COSMETICS 
- LOCALIZATION (NEW!)
- NEW MUSIC ON THE SPEAKER FROM GRP GAMES, STATIC AMOUR, SWEET MYLO AND SHELDON CHARLOT!
- NEW SHELDON CHARLOT COLLABORATION BUNDLE IN THE SHOP NOW!
- CREDITS BOARD IN BASEMENT (NEW!)

The Black Hole has become more powerful, distorted and noisy, Uh oh..
Speaker is more spatial.
Skip button on Speaker
Prop movements
Proper game credits given
Music catalog fixed (Doesn't play Just Call all the time anymore)
Flowers cosmetic placement fixed (Now on right hand)
30000 Nanas Option
Valentines Cosmetics indicator
Added a monkey to tell you where to buy cosmetics and everything (Matches your color)
Color fixes
